title: XthWorld
author: XthWorld
created_time: October 15, 2022, 04:58:07 AMLast edit: May 03, 2023, 11:37:10 AM by XthWorld
content: X'thWorld Is Comming Back Online.As many of you already know we had to shut down our platform for some time while we fix important error to our script.All necessary fixes have been made currently, but just before we open up again we are making some UX UI and script improvements. Some of the script changes where not really possible to complete with a live web, so we used this opportunity to make those changes now and come back when we are done with it. Those changes have been mainly completed, we are just polishing it.We are hoping to activate site entry at 17th of May 00:00 UTC if no unexpected issues accrue.You can read about this more in our News -> https://www.xthworld.com/news.php.

comments.author: XthWorld
comments.body: We just wanted to let everyone know about the news above

comments.author: XthWorld
comments.body: Platform is working normally, just sometimes our servers have difficulty handling incoming traffic and slowdowns for few seconds.All services are operational.Visit us to confirm your self

comments.author: Alge898
comments.body: Quote from: XthWorld on August 14, 2023, 05:58:04 AMPlatform is working normally, just sometimes our servers have difficulty handling incoming traffic and slowdowns for few seconds.All services are operational.Visit us to confirm your self Hi,Who is the developer? can you please share info in private?Thanks in advance

comments.author: cucuman
comments.body: I can't withdraw any satoshi, the site keeps repeating the same message "error! unfortunately payment has been cancelled." what should i do please help thanks...

comments.author: crazyalex
comments.body: A good game, a good idea.But unfortunately it doesn't pay.
